titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to limit the rate of increase of the part B medicare premium to the rate of increase in Social Security benefits.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 2/16/1988--Introduced. Amends part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance) of title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to limit the rate of increase of the part B premium to the rate of increase of part B benefits.
